biography.value:
A goon balloon looks like a 5-foot-diameter beach ball with clawed feet. Unblinking eyes on the outer surface of its spherical air sac enable the creature to see in all directions at once. These eyes can produce kaleidoscopic light that tears at the minds of the goon balloon’s foes.

A goon balloon speaks by pumping air through a hidden orifice on its underside. When the goon balloon dies, the air in its sac transforms into a noxious gas that bursts from the corpse, potentially poisoning other creatures nearby.

Although they can seem playful and harmless, goon balloons are quite mean-spirited. They like to observe the suffering of other creatures and orchestrate that suffering, given half a chance.

description.value:
The goon balloon makes two Claw attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Magical, kaleidoscopic light emanates from one of the goon balloon’s eyes as the goon balloon targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a [[/save wis 12 format=long]], taking [[/damage 1d12 type=psychic average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Burst. The goon balloon bursts when it drops to 0 hit points, releasing noxious gas in a 10-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} centered on itself. Creatures in that area must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. A &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Unusual &Reference[nat]{Nature}. The goon balloon doesn’t require air, food, or drink.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The goon balloon moves up to 20 feet vertically in one direction without provoking opportunity attack;opportunity attacks. If it ends this movement suspended in the air, it hovers in place. It can’t be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone} while airborne.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
